snippet.title: Lacuna | Sci-Fi Noir Adventure | Announcement Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
🕵️ Out NOW on Steam and GOG:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1364100/Lacuna__A_SciFi_Noir_Adventure/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/lacuna_a_scifi_noir_adventure
Free Prologue: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588570/Lacuna_Prologue/
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Klskv1WdlD2uew01TMX6KB

Get the 'Save the World Edition' to get the game’s atmospheric soundtrack that lets you dive deep into the sci-fi noir world of Lacuna. In addition, Assemble Entertainment donates 10% of the revenues of this edition to Go Give One; a WHO initiative that provides COVID-19 vaccines amongst others for everyone, everywhere – prioritizing those who need them the most in countries that cannot afford them: https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/14903/Lacuna__Save_the_World/

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬
Shop: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/AssembleEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/assembleteam
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/assembleteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assembleteam/
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/assembleteam/assemble-newsletter
Website: http://www.assemble-entertainment.com/

▬ Lacuna ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/PGCxfr9
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DigiTales-Interactive-1894851840820523/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/digitales_games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/digitalesinteractive/
Website: http://lacuna.game/
Developer: https://digitales.games/

▬ About Lacuna ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
A murder. A hack. A bombing. All it takes to plunge the solar system into war – unless you do something about it. Help CDI agent Neil Conrad make a string of increasingly difficult decisions in this modern dialog-driven adventure set in a gorgeous 2D sci-fi noir universe. #Lacuna #Adventure

▬ Features ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
• Platformer movement controls (WASD / controller)
• Non-repeating conversations and choices
• Immersive, story-driven mysteries
• Optional outlines on anything interactable
• Story can always be driven forward
• Real choices and multiple endings

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬▬
Based in Wiesbaden, Germany, Assemble Entertainment is an independent games developer and publisher, best known for modernized award-winning Leisure Suit Larry series, featuring two new entries in the iconic decades-spanning saga, and the multi-award-winning Endzone - A World Apart, that challenges players to survive and thrive following an environmental apocalypse. Assemble Entertainment also organizes GermanDevDays, an annual conference that attracts more than 1,200 attendees from across the German-speaking video game development industry. @AssembleTeam #AssembleEntertainment

▬ More Links ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Livestream: https://www.twitch.tv/assembleentertainment
Assemble Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/assemble-entertainment/
Endzone Discord: https://discord.com/invite/worldofendzone
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AssembleEntertainment/

▬ More Games  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Endzone - A World Apart: https://youtu.be/O7eLGc0judo?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Ihy-ItrWqQH72FpcNQjGdw
Leisure Suit Larry – Wet Dreams Don’t Dry: https://youtu.be/c-6WyjEJFVk?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KRexrNB03Ocpz-cGNeHVaB
Lacuna: https://youtu.be/sWh4Fzv7vLE?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Klskv1WdlD2uew01TMX6KB
Orbital Bullet: https://youtu.be/hS5TBMEHYlQ?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KoD1PoEF2hSDp5-NvGLhyC
ITORAH: https://youtu.be/CPJvHciJpwY?list=PLEM2iueadJ3J51klutPCVfYV1QjcE8-xE
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
